title: Literary landmarks of Edinburgh,
author: Hutton, Laurence
snippet: In" Home's Life and Letters" no hint is given as tohis Edinburgh abiding-place. He died there, at aripe old age, in I808, and was buried in the yard ofSouth Leith Parish Church, on the outer wall ofwhich, on the south side, is a tablet with a simpleinscription to his memory. It is visible, but notlegible, from Kirkgate Street.
